typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Airport_Code as string,
		Airport_Name as string,
		Time_Label as string,
		Time_Month as string,
		Time_Month_Name as string,
		Time_Year as string,
		{Statistics_#_of_Delays_Carrier} as string,
		{Statistics_#_of_Delays_Late_Aircraft} as string,
		{Statistics_#_of_Delays_National_Aviation_System} as string,
		{Statistics_#_of_Delays_Security} as string,
		{Statistics_#_of_Delays_Weather} as string,
		Statistics_Carriers_Names as string,
		Statistics_Carriers_Total as string,
		Statistics_Flights_Cancelled as string,
		Statistics_Flights_Delayed as string,
		Statistics_Flights_Diverted as string,
		Statistics_Flights_On_Time as string,
		Statistics_Flights_Total as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Carrier as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Late_Aircraft as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_National_Aviation_System as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Security as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Total as string,
		Statistics_Minutes_Delayed_Weather as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> FetchDimAirline
FetchDimAirline aggregate(groupBy(Airport_Code,
		Airport_Name),
	AirportCount = count(Airport_Code)) ~> DistinctData
DistinctData sink(input(
		Idairline as integer,
		airlinename as string,
		airlinecode as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> DimAirlineDestination
